questions.question: …………………….. tact would have saved the situation.
questions.description: Little means hardly any a little means some, but not much.

questions.question: Of the three, opera, movies and music, the ………………………. is his favorite.
questions.description: Use latter when there are only two things.

questions.question: ……………………… book you mention is out of print.
questions.description: We use ‘the’ to speak of a particular person or thing.

questions.question: I dislike ………………………. fellow.
questions.description: We use ‘the’ to speak of a particular person or thing.

questions.question: …………………….. darkest cloud has a silver lining.
Banaras is …………………… holy city.
questions.description: We use ‘a’ in the numerical sense of one.

questions.question: Alladin had ……………………. magic lamp.
questions.description: We use ‘a’ in the numerical sense of one.

questions.question: ……………………. scheme failed for want of support.
questions.description: We use ‘the’ to speak of a particular person or thing.

questions.question: ………………………. people want a new system.
questions.description: We use most before a noun without a determiner.

questions.question: ………………………. these doors leads to the hall.
questions.description: We use neither of before a noun with a determiner.

questions.question: ………………………… the green apples were given to Sarah.
questions.description: We use six of before a noun with an article, possessive or demonstrative.

questions.question: ……………………. of my friends smoke.
questions.description: No is not used before of. Instead we use none.
